problem.p: Part 4. Which statement about points E and K is correct?

choice.name: foil1
choice.text: At point E, force f has a greater magnitude than at point K; the direction of the force at point E is opposite to the one at point K

choice.name: foil2
choice.text: At point K, force f has a greater magnitude than at point E; the direction of the force at point K is opposite to the one at point E

choice.name: foil3
choice.text: At point E, force f has a greater magnitude than at point K; the direction of the force at point E is the same as the one at point K

choice.name: foil4
choice.text: At point K, force f has a greater magnitude than at point E; the direction of the force at point K is the same as the one at point E
